channel.title: Homes on Nathan Broadbent
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Nathan Broadbent

item.title: about
item.description: Hello! I’m a software developer. I enjoy building web and mobile applications, mainly with Ruby on Rails, React, and React Native. I also have experience with DevOps, including AWS, Heroku, Terraform, Chef, OpsWorks, Ansible, Capistrano, Convox, Docker, and Kubernetes. I received an O-1 visa to work in the US, and I passed the Toptal screening process.
